WorkItem.Description:
I've noticed that when subtracting a Zero from A, the Carry flag gets set. 

eg:

MVI A, 1H
SUI 0

The Carry Flag gets set. 

Unluckily, I dont have a real 8085 to try it out, but on an Emulator the same operation didnt set the carry flag.

Regards,
Asaad
WorkItem.Summary: Subtraction of a Zero sets the Carry Flag
